title: No way.. Hacking? In league of legends?
body:
Something strange happened. We were losing but made a comeback and aced them. Took down inhib then right tower then left tower. Couldn't hit the Nexus.... So we went back to check on inhib as they were spawning but it was still down. Then w... My firefox and league just simultaneously crashed. But I'll continue. We couldn't finish because there was no tower we could hit nor the nexus and then they respawned and aced us cause we were super low. I thought I was stoned or something but then our Jax started losing his shit in allchat demanding to know who's hacking so It wasn't just me.
Heres teh crash: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/392432051271368724/521514567847641089/unknown.png
Here's some screenshots from the post game chat:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/392432051271368724/521512563314524160/unknown.png
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/392432051271368724/521512501536620585/unknown.png

I'm downloading the replay now and seeing what it thinks.
EDIT: I saw the replay and its exactly what I thought. I;m gonna upload it to youtube and link it soon.
Basically we took the right turret but apparently didn't finish the left one. we were both desynched at the perfect time to save them... Then we stood around nexus doing nothing because there was no turret or nexus to hit. WTF?

replies.body:
Their mid inhib respawned after you took the first nexus turret (it's starting its respawn animation in the beginning of your video, in fact, and you can see it spawns on the minimap the moment the "bug/hack" occurs)... you can't target nexus turrets without an inhib. This isn't a bug just unlucky lol.

Had this happen plenty of times, turret gets low with an inhib respawning and it *feels* like it went down because it became untargetable, and people click around confused for a couple seconds until their brains come back online.

I just noticed something. This might be a bug. If you watch closely. we stopped hitting the tower exactly when their inhib respawned. Also, keep in mind, the reason we stopped hitting tower is because there was no tower for us to hit.
You need an inhibitor dow. To hit the nexus and nexus turrets it's not a bug, you just lack basic knowledge of the game and instantly resort to hacks and bugs

Can you read the post? You know what else blocks an nexus attack? Having a nexus turret.
I'm gonna reiterate what I said. The point isn't that we couldnt hit nexus. It was that we couldn't hit left nexus tower..... Cause it was dead momentarily for us and then somehow came back. Like yes inhib blocks nexus turret. We didn't even see a nexus turret... Our entire team thought we killed it.

I think you just got confused in the heat of the moment.
Weird that this is the first time that happened to you, I mean it's not like you're new to the game or anything.

The point is the inhib respawned and then we realized a tower was still up even though we killed the tower.

You're one dense person. The Inhib wasn't magically respawned by hax. You can even see the "inhib is respawning soon" message in chat while you fight near elder. The inhib spawned as you were hitting the second tower. Nothing weird happened in your game at all.
Inhib respawned at the worst time, not a hack. However, it is a troll by the game.

this does not look like a hack at all.   it certainly look like the game had a major issue. either a error that went live with a patch or something  idk.
 that a pretty big bug though

I agree. It's just very convenient and very tilting. Like Jax and I seriously thought we were going insane or something. Like I thought I switched world lines. Like in Steins;Gate. Imagine killing a tower, being unable to kill nexus, a second later, realizing tower is still shooting dying. Then seeing the tower still there. Even though we know that on our screen we killed it, then losing.
Sounds more like server issues than hacking, but do post that replay. Either way riot should know about it.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=W6oqLJjl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-10T02:36:57.621+0000)
>
> Sounds more like server issues than hacking, but do post that replay. Either way riot should know about it.

The thing is. It was way too convenient and happened to both of us trying to win.

Here's the video. Notice how Jax and I stop hitting the turret at the exact same time. It was dead for us. We were standing there uber confused why we couldn't finish.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SHY4lrHEsc0&feature=youtu.be

League is not P2P, and your IP address is not exposed, plus communications are encrypted. There is no way someone could be spoofing packets for individual players unless they both had total control of the server plus access to the server sourcecode.

That is a pretty small list of people, and it would be really easy to find the person responsible, who would have to be an employee. There is just no logic to it.

I'm well aware. However I just lost a game because my entire living team couldn't hit a nexus. That's very suspicious.

For the umpteenth time. I have stated in one of my first posts that I don't believe it's a hack.. This is really characteristic of the league community. The point is my entire team saw the turret go down. We literally saw no turret. Jax had to flash out of the turret once he realized something somehow was killing him and the first thing he said after we died was something along the lines of "HOW IS THE DEAD TOWER STILL FIRING" there was no tower for us. When the inhib respawned, we killed the tower. Like it crumbled away and there was just the base. Our team only realized there was still a tower after we were all dead. I know you can't attack nexus towers with an inhib up? Do you all lack comprehension skills? The point is that for my entire team, that tower was dead.

> [{quoted}](name=BestPudgeNA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=W6oqLJjl,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2018-12-10T14:33:36.582+0000)

Mate? Nothing weird with a tower dying for only one team?

this wasn't a hack at all, while you were attacking the second nexus turret the enemy inhibitor respawned. you cant attack a nexus turret without destroying an inhibitor first. left tower didnt die because of the inhibitor being there, so its most likely a visual error on your end of the pc.
While certain forms of hacking do, and always will, exist... this isn't an instance of it.
